channel.title: Gui on Rico.ai
channel.description: Recent content in Gui on Rico.ai

item.title: R2D2 Flask GUI
item.description: Flask GUI The code is written in Python so I can utilize ROS in the future. I wanted to use a GUI that I can use in the web browser, so it will work on any platform including mobile. The RPI3 in my R2D2 will have an wifi connection. So I can connect Ad-Hoc directly to the RPI3 and use the browser to control some of the accessories in my R2D2.
